sections.title: Video Essay
body: I made this video essay for master degree program applications.
It is also a nice 2-minute introduction video!

items.title: Introduction video
items.body: This is a 2-minute introduction video I made in 2021 for master program applications.

sections.title: Orientation Videos
body: I was in a Joint Bachelors Degree Program (JBDP) during 2019-2022.
It's a program between Columbia University and City University of Hong Kong.
For every year the program has a pre-departure orientation session for admitted students.
I recorded and finished two videos for two of the sessions.

sections.title: Columbia & CityU HK JBDP Pre-departure Orientation Session

items.title: 2021 - Episode 2
items.body: This is for the orientation session in 2021.

items.title: 2020 - Episode 1
items.body: This is for the orientation session in 2020.
